mapper.sql: id as id, type as type, serial_number as serialNumber, code as code, facility_group_id as facilityGroupId, ou_id as ouId, upper_capacity as upperCapacity, automatic_warehouse_crossing as automaticWarehouseCrossing, chr_id as chrId, lifecycle as lifecycle, create_id as createId, create_time as createTime, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, modified_id as modifiedId
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_handover_station SET type = #{type,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , serial_number = #{serialNumber,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , code = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , facility_group_id = #{facilityGroupId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , upper_capacity = #{upperCapacity,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , automatic_warehouse_crossing = #{automaticWarehouseCrossing,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , chr_id = #{chrId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , lifecycle = #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , create_id = #{createId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id} and ou_id = #{ouId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_wh_handover_station where id = #{id} and ou_id = #{ouId}
mapper.select: select hd.id as id, hd.type as type, hd.serial_number as serialNumber, hd.code as code, hd.facility_group_id as facilityGroupId, hd.ou_id as ouId, hd.upper_capacity as upperCapacity, hd.automatic_warehouse_crossing as automaticWarehouseCrossing, hd.chr_id as chrId, hd.lifecycle as lifecycle, hd.create_id as createId, hd.create_time as createTime, hd.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, hd.modified_id as modifiedId, hr.rule_code as chrCode from t_wh_handover_station hd left join t_wh_handover_collection_rule hr on hd.chr_id = hr.id where hd.facility_group_id=#{facilityGroupId} and hd.ou_id = #{ouId} order by hd.serial_number

select id as id, type as type, serial_number as serialNumber, code as code, facility_group_id as facilityGroupId, ou_id as ouId, upper_capacity as upperCapacity, automatic_warehouse_crossing as automaticWarehouseCrossing, chr_id as chrId, lifecycle as lifecycle, create_id as createId, create_time as createTime, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, modified_id as modifiedId from t_wh_handover_station where code=#{code}

select hs.id as id, hs.type as type, hs.serial_number as serialNumber, hs.code as code, hs.facility_group_id as facilityGroupId, hs.ou_id as ouId, hs.upper_capacity as upperCapacity, hs.automatic_warehouse_crossing as automaticWarehouseCrossing, hs.chr_id as chrId, hs.lifecycle as lifecycle, hs.create_id as createId, hs.create_time as createTime, hs.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, hs.modified_id as modifiedId from t_wh_handover_station hs left join t_wh_handover_collection hc on hs.id = hc.handover_station_id where (hc.handover_status != 1 or hc.handover_status ！=5 or hc.handover_status ！=20) and hs.lifecycle = 1 and hs.facility_group_id = #{facilityGroupId} and hs.ou_id = #{ouId} limit 1

select hs.id as id, hs.type as type, hs.serial_number as serialNumber, hs.code as code, hs.facility_group_id as facilityGroupId, hs.ou_id as ouId, hs.upper_capacity as upperCapacity, hs.automatic_warehouse_crossing as automaticWarehouseCrossing, hs.chr_id as chrId, hs.lifecycle as lifecycle, hs.create_id as createId, hs.create_time as createTime, hs.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, hs.modified_id as modifiedId from t_wh_handover_station hs left join t_wh_handover_collection hc on hs.id = hc.handover_station_id where (hc.handover_status != 1 or hc.handover_status ！=5 or hc.handover_status ！=20) and hs.lifecycle = 1 and hs.facility_group_id is null and hs.ou_id = #{ouId} limit 1
